name: Darshan
description: '''Darshan''' is an American Jewish [[alternative hip hop]] group from [[Brooklyn]], [[New York (state)|New York]]. Formed in 2008, the group primarily consists of rapper [[Eprhyme]] and singer-songwriters [[Shir Yaakov]] and [[Basya Schechter]]. Its debut album, ''Deeper and Higher'', was released in 2015, followed by a second album, ''Raza'', in 2017.
